content: you wish repeat each instruction to the end of the round if you stopped after round 1 if you stopped after round 3 c2 1 *k5 k3tog 36 sts c4 1 *k5 k3tog 36 sts c2 2 *k1 sl1 c4 2 *sl k1 c2 3 knit all sts c4 3 knit all sts c2 4 *sl1 k1 c4 4 *k1 sl1 c2 5 *k3 k3tog 24 sts c4 5 *k3 k3tog 24 sts c2 6 *k1 sl1 c4 6 *sl1 k1 c2 7 knit all sts c4 7 knit all sts c2 8 *sl1 k1 c4 8 *k1 sl1 c2 9 *k1 k3tog 12 sts c4 9 *k1 k3tog 12 sts c2 10 *k1 sl1 c4 10 *sl1 k1 c2 11 *k2tog 6 sts c4 11 *k2tog 6 sts pull yarn end through the remaining 6 stitches weave in the yarn ends block lightly if you wish © ashcroft-hempsall 2019 - for personal non-commercial use only
